title: Senior CPC official meets Sri Lankan guests
content: Zhou Yongkang (R), a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee, meets with Ranil Wickremesinghe, head of Sri Lanka’s United National Party, in Beijing, capital of China, June 11, 2012. (Xinhua/Li Tao) BEIJING, June 11 (Xinhua) — A senior official of the Communist Party…
